manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Tingle. Invigorate. Renew. Experience the Famous Tingle Complex A blend of tea tree, peppermint, and lavender leaves a cooling "tingling" sensation on the scalp to invigorate the hair and senses.

Previous page REMOVES BUILDUP An exfoliating rinse that clears away product buildup, dirt, and dead skin MULTI-TASKS Use as body lotion to rejuvenate and hydrate skin or as a leave-in conditioner to quench dry strands INVIGORATES SOOTHES Recondition and repair hair and scalp weekly with a mask containing soy protein, panthenol, and shea MAXIMUM HOLD & SHINE Create a style that stays a while with a firm hold, flake-free hair gel that builds body and shine Next page Discover more from the Special Collection. Find your Tea Tree Product. 1 Special Detox 2 Hair & Body 3 Scalp Care 4 Firm Hold Gel

Previous page Discover our commitment to sustainability We're scaling up our tree planting efforts to reach two million trees planted by 2030. In 1980, we became the first professional beauty company to say no to animal testing. We source 100% Australian tea tree oil sourced from farms certified for their responsible practices. We are transitioning to post-consumer recycled (PCR) packaging by 2025. Next page 1 Two Million Trees 2 Cruelty-Free Pioneer 3 Responsible Sourcing 4 Reduce Virgin Plastic

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Deep-Cleansing Game Changer You Need
reviews.reviewText: Oh boy, where do I even begin with Tea Tree Special Shampoo? This stuff is a game changer! I stumbled upon this shampoo while aimlessly wandering through the hair care aisle, and I'm so glad I did. I'm not exaggerating when I say it's the best shampoo I've ever used.First off, let's talk about the scent. It's like a magical blend of mint and tea tree oil that will transport you to a refreshing spa. I swear, just inhaling the scent wakes me up in the morning better than a cup of coffee. And the best part? The scent lingers in your hair all day long, so you can enjoy it even after you've left the shower.But the real magic happens when you start lathering up. This shampoo has a deep-cleansing formula that leaves your scalp feeling squeaky clean. I have naturally oily hair, so finding a shampoo that can actually remove all the excess oil is a struggle. But Tea Tree Special Shampoo manages to do it without leaving my hair feeling stripped or dry. It's like a miracle in a bottle.Now, I have to warn you, this shampoo does create a bit of a tingly sensation on your scalp. It's not painful, but it's definitely noticeable. I personally love it - it makes me feel like I'm really getting a deep clean. But if you're sensitive to that sort of thing, you might want to proceed with caution.Overall, I would give Tea Tree Special Shampoo a 5 out of 5 stars, without a doubt. It's perfect for all hair types, but especially those with oily hair. And let's be real, who doesn't love a good tingly sensation? So if you're looking for a refreshing and effective shampoo, look no further. Tea Tree Special Shampoo is the way to go.Now, let me tell you a little story about how Tea Tree Special Shampoo saved my hair. I used to be a chronic over-washer - I would shampoo my hair every single day without fail. But that was before I discovered the magic of Tea Tree Special Shampoo.One day, I went on vacation and forgot to pack my beloved shampoo. I had to settle for a cheap drugstore brand, and let me tell you, it was not pretty. My hair felt greasy and limp, and my scalp was itchy and uncomfortable. It was then that I realized just how much of a difference Tea Tree Special Shampoo made in my hair care routine.Since that fateful vacation, I've become a Tea Tree Special Shampoo devotee. I only wash my hair every other day now, and my hair has never looked better. It's shiny, bouncy, and feels incredibly clean. And I have Tea Tree Special Shampoo to thank for that.I know this review might sound a little over-the-top, but I swear I'm not exaggerating. Tea Tree Special Shampoo is the real deal. It's funny how something as simple as a shampoo can make such a huge difference in your life. But hey, when you find something that works, you've got to shout it from the rooftops. So, to sum it all up - if you're looking for a shampoo that deep cleans, refreshes your scalp, and makes your hair look amazing, Tea Tree Special Shampoo is the way to go. Trust me, your hair will thank you.Let me also talk about the versatility of Tea Tree Special Shampoo. Not only is it great for everyday use, but it also comes in handy for those times when you need a little extra help. For example, if you've been using a lot of styling products or hairspray, Tea Tree Special Shampoo can help remove any buildup and leave your hair feeling fresh.And if you're someone who loves hitting the gym or going for a run, this shampoo is a must-have. The tea tree oil and peppermint extract give your scalp a cooling sensation that's incredibly refreshing after a workout. Plus, the deep-cleansing formula will help remove any sweat and dirt that may have accumulated on your scalp during your workout.Now, let's talk about the packaging. I know, it might seem like a small detail, but I really appreciate that this shampoo comes in a pump bottle. It's so much easier to use in the shower than a traditional bottle with a flip top. And the pump dispenses just the right amount of shampoo - not too much, not too little.One last thing I want to mention is the fact that Tea Tree Special Shampoo is cruelty-free. As someone who's trying to make more conscious choices when it comes to my beauty products, this is a big selling point for me. It's nice to know that I can use a product that works well and is also ethically made.In conclusion, if you're looking for a shampoo that's refreshing, effective, and versatile, Tea Tree Special Shampoo is the way to go. It smells amazing, leaves your hair feeling clean and healthy, and comes in a convenient pump bottle. Plus, it's cruelty-free, which is always a bonus in my book. So go ahead and give it a try - I promise you won't be disappointed!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Refreshing Experience - Five Stars!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased Tea Tree Special Shampoo, and I can confidently say that this product deserves a solid five stars. From the moment I opened the bottle, I was greeted by an invigorating aroma that instantly refreshed my senses. The smell is not just good; it's fantastic – a perfect blend of tea tree oil that leaves my hair and scalp feeling incredibly clean and revitalized.One of the aspects I appreciate most about this shampoo is its commitment to natural ingredients. The inclusion of tea tree oil, renowned for its natural antibacterial and antifungal properties, sets this shampoo apart from others in the market. It's reassuring to know that I am treating my hair and scalp with a product that harnesses the power of nature without any harmful chemicals or additives. My hair feels healthier, softer, and much more manageable since I started using this shampoo.Beyond its delightful scent and natural ingredients, Tea Tree Special Shampoo delivers exceptional results. It effectively cleanses my hair, removing build-up and leaving it feeling thoroughly refreshed without stripping away its natural oils. It lathers beautifully, making every wash a luxurious experience. Additionally, I've noticed a significant reduction in dandruff and scalp irritation, thanks to the tea tree oil, making it an ideal choice for those with sensitive scalps.I also appreciate the way my hair feels after using this shampoo – it's not just clean, but it also has a noticeable shine and volume that lasts throughout the day. The product rinses out easily and doesn't leave any residue, ensuring my hair feels light and refreshed after every wash.In conclusion, Tea Tree Special Shampoo has exceeded my expectations. Its incredible scent, coupled with the power of natural ingredients, makes it a standout product in the world of hair care. My hair has never looked or felt better, and I credit it to this exceptional shampoo. If you're looking for a shampoo that delivers on both fragrance and quality, this is the one to go for. Five stars without a doubt!
Muy fresco y muy bueno para piel grasosa

reviews.reviewTitle: Same as it's always been, which is perfect.
reviews.reviewText: Have always been a fan, cleans well, smells great and doubles as body wash. Lasts quiet a long time.
Este shampoo te ayuda mucho a limpiar a profundidad pero su frescura es intensa

Me lo recomendó mi estilista para la resequedad en mi cuero cabelludo, pero la verdad no sentí diferencia alguna.Tiene un aroma muy fuerte a menta, y algunas veces sentí incomodidad en mis ojos cuando me caía un poco, y eso que no son sensibles mis ojos.Lo bueno que me pedí la versión pequeña, para probarlo y decidirme a comprar el grande ya que es bastante caro (a mi parecer), no me funcionó y claramente no lo volvería a comprar.Opté por probar los shampoo en barra, y siento que me a ido mejor, aparte que no contienen tantos químicos y son amigables con el medio ambiente.

reviews.reviewTitle: Producto de gran calidad. Sensación única.
